name: FeverDream-Chess
description:
Do you like to feel stressed out? Then this hardcore, one-dimension chess game is absolutely right for you. For every turn you have 20 beats time.
You choose which song (They are all hardcore). First Player that has no Pieces left on the field loses. This game is still in development and has some bugs(especially in the endgame of the AI) and lacks a real tutorial.  But you can still let me know what you think of the concept. Small Tutorial PieceMovesHints Pawncant move backwards Bishopcan jump over Pieces Knightcan jump over pieces Rookcan't jump over pieces Crosshaircan fire only 3 times

con only shoot or move in one turn

breaks AI  lol
